cast.name: 布莱德利·库珀 Bradley Cooper

this_title: Actors on Actors: Emma Stone ＆ Bradley Cooper
trans_title: 演员对谈：艾玛·斯通＆布莱德利·库珀
introduction: Emma Stone and Bradley Cooper reunite in their #ActorsOnActors conversation to talk about 'Maestro,' in which Cooper plays legendary stage a nd screen composer Leonard Bernstein, and 'Poor Things,' Stone’s latest collaboration with Yorgos Lanthimos.
chinese_title: 演员对谈：艾玛·斯通＆布莱德利·库珀
foreign_title: Actors on Actors: Emma Stone ＆ Bradley Cooper
